channel.title: Efidroid on Luca Weiss
channel.description: Recent content in Efidroid on Luca Weiss

item.title: Install and configure EFIDroid on the Fairphone 2
item.description: Table of contents: About EFIDroid How to install (FP2) Add a new ROM Add a system to the new ROM Booting into your new ROM About EFIDroid EFIDroid is a relatively new multiboot solution for mobile devices. It is based on the EFI implementation by Intel (EDK2). For more information and support, please visit to the Fairphone Forum thread. How to install (FP2) Download the EFIDroid Manager app from Google Play: https://play.
